content.prompt: The print above, commemorating the women’s march on Versailles in October 1789, shows that

choices.label: lower-class women opposed the convening of the Estates-General
lower-class women were defenders of the aristocracy
women helped the progress of the Revolution
women wanted to leave their homes to join the work force
women supported pacifism and the status quo

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
